errorResult.ALREADY_LOGGED_IN_ERROR: Cannot set a Customer for the Order when already logged in
errorResult.ALREADY_REFUNDED_ERROR: Cannot refund an OrderItem which has already been refunded
errorResult.CANCEL_ACTIVE_ORDER_ERROR: Cannot cancel OrderLines from an Order in the "{ orderState }" state
errorResult.CHANNEL_DEFAULT_LANGUAGE_ERROR: Cannot make language "{ language }" unavailable as it is used as the defaultLanguage by the channel "{ channelCode }"
errorResult.COUPON_CODE_INVALID_ERROR: Coupon code "{ couponCode }" is not valid
errorResult.COUPON_CODE_LIMIT_ERROR: Coupon code cannot be used more than {limit, plural, one {once} other {# times}} per customer
errorResult.CREATE_FULFILLMENT_ERROR: An error occurred when attempting to create the Fulfillment
errorResult.EMAIL_ADDRESS_CONFLICT_ERROR: The email address is not available.
errorResult.EMPTY_ORDER_LINE_SELECTION_ERROR: At least one OrderLine must be specified
errorResult.INELIGIBLE_SHIPPING_METHOD_ERROR: This Order is not eligible for the selected ShippingMethod
errorResult.INSUFFICIENT_STOCK_ERROR: {quantityAvailable, plural, =0 {No se agrego el producto} one {Solo un artículo fué agregado} other {Solo # artículos fueron agregados}} al pedido por falta de stock
errorResult.INSUFFICIENT_STOCK_ON_HAND_ERROR: Cannot create a Fulfillment as '{productVariantName}' has insufficient stockOnHand ({stockOnHand})
errorResult.ITEMS_ALREADY_FULFILLED_ERROR: One or more OrderItems are already part of a Fulfillment
errorResult.LANGUAGE_NOT_AVAILABLE_ERROR: Language "{languageCode}" is not available. First enable it via GlobalSettings and try again
errorResult.MANUAL_PAYMENT_STATE_ERROR: A manual payment may only be added when in the "ArrangingPayment" or "ArrangingAdditionalPayment" states
errorResult.MIME_TYPE_ERROR: El tipo MIME '{ mimeType }' no está permitido.
errorResult.MISSING_CONDITIONS_ERROR: A Promotion must have either at least one condition or a coupon code set
errorResult.NEGATIVE_QUANTITY_ERROR: The quantity for an OrderItem cannot be negative
errorResult.NO_ACTIVE_ORDER_ERROR: There is no active Order associated with the current session
errorResult.NOT_VERIFIED_ERROR: Please verify this email address before logging in
errorResult.ORDER_LIMIT_ERROR: No se agrego el producto. Un pedido puede tener hasta un máximo de { maxItems } artículos
errorResult.ORDER_MODIFICATION_ERROR: Order contents may only be modified when in the "AddingItems" state
errorResult.ORDER_PAYMENT_STATE_ERROR: A Payment may only be added when Order is in "ArrangingPayment" state
errorResult.ORDER_STATE_TRANSITION_ERROR: Cannot transition Order from "{ fromState }" to "{ toState }"
errorResult.PASSWORD_ALREADY_SET_ERROR: A password has already been set during registration
errorResult.PAYMENT_ORDER_MISMATCH_ERROR: The Payment and OrderLines do not belong to the same Order
errorResult.PAYMENT_STATE_TRANSITION_ERROR: Cannot transition Payment from "{ fromState }" to "{ toState }"
errorResult.PRODUCT_OPTION_IN_USE_ERROR: Cannot remove ProductOptionGroup "{ optionGroupCode }" as it is used by {productVariantCount, plural, one {1 ProductVariant} other {# ProductVariants}}
errorResult.QUANTITY_TOO_GREAT_ERROR: The specified quantity is greater than the available OrderItems
errorResult.REFUND_ORDER_STATE_ERROR: Cannot refund an Order in the "{ orderState }" state
errorResult.VERIFICATION_TOKEN_EXPIRED_ERROR: Verification token has expired. Use refreshCustomerVerification to send a new token.
